Params: {2: '???', 3: 'No. 1364, your position after graduation has been decided.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'After graduation, you will join the Aurora Squadron.'}
{2: 'Haniff', 3: "Aurora Squadron... The name doesn't ring a bell. Is it your secret force?", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Correct. We've agreed through discussion that this would be the most suitable position for you."}
{3: 'The voice, quite uncommonly, carries a subtle trace of sarcasm.'}
{2: '???', 3: "It's safer to keep a cunning person like you close to us, don't you think?"}
{2: '???', 3: "Even though you've been trying to misguide us by deliberately displaying mediocre talent in order to get assigned to the Task Force."}
{2: '???', 3: "Do you really think we wouldn't uncover your little scheme when we've been closely watching you?"}
{2: 'Haniff', 3: "Now that you've found out, why are you still going to keep someone like me so close to you?", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Your little rebellion is nothing more than a source of amusing entertainment for us.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Remember, you are Kurono's asset. Do not ask questions or overthink. All you need to do is execute our orders."}
{3: 'Haniff looks up at the low ceiling and ponders whether he will live in a bigger cage in the future.'}
